prompt: Thank a recruiter for scheduling an interview
subject: Thank You for the Interview Opportunity
body:
Dear [Recruiter's Name],

Thank you for scheduling my interview for the [Position Name] role at [Company Name]. I appreciate the opportunity and look forward to speaking with the team.

Warm regards,
[Your Name]

subject: Request for Project Deadline Extension
body:
Dear [Manager's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. Due to unforeseen circumstances, I would like to request an extension on the deadline for [Project Name]. I believe an additional [X days] will allow me to deliver a higher-quality result.

Thank you for your understanding.
Best,
[Your Name]

subject: Great Connecting at the Event
body:
Hi [Name],

It was a pleasure meeting you at [Event Name]. I enjoyed our conversation about [Topic]. Let’s stay in touch — I’d love to connect further about opportunities in [Industry/Field].

Warm regards,
[Your Name]
